title: Terrene v1.4
description:
A smartphone game about space physics, social interaction and logophilia.

Asteroids are both your friends and your enemies. Use them to move ahead, but don't get too close. Uncover the lore of mankind on the way.

Lost in unknown space with a broken engine, the player is to use Tractor Beam and utilize physic to maneuvre among asteroids, which would either assist or destroy you. 

Pickup items are spawned on the way, including Repair Kits for extra lives and Data Disks for score bonus and unusual but interesting words.

Game features:

- Addictive procedurally generated gameplay with endless value
- Striking, minimalistic and customizable visual
- Featuring interesting lexicons invented by mankind around the world
- Clay.io leaderboard integration

What's New:

Version 1.05
- Added Vibration setting
Version 1.06
- Re-aligned settings on main menu
Version 1.20
- Tuned some instance handling codes
- Major gameplay overhaul
->Multi-touch gameplay, up to 3 points
->Asteroids are now traced when being pulled continuously
->Tuned freighter rotation method
Version 1.4
- Tuned difficulty
- New Hardcore Mode with separate Leaderboard
- Fixed layout for larger tablets
